channel.title: Tokens Help
channel.description: Okay, I made my own form of currency in a shop. Using champions tokens. Now I followed some tut on how to add other forms of currency, I added everything exactly right. Now when you use money in shop it works. But, only if you have at least 1 champion token. It will say not enough tokens but you can still buy with the money and 1 champion token. Please help me fix this.

item.title: Tokens Help
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I only want “tokens” to be taken.

Read full topic

Is that for the shop that you only want “coins” to be accepted?

item.title: Tokens Help
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Okay.int Slot5 = 0;if (Slot5 == -1 && MyShopID == 27) { sM("You don't have enough Champion Tokens."); break; } if (Slot5 == -1 && MyShopID == 36) { sM("You don't have enough Champion Tokens."); break; }[code] if (MyShopID == 27) {
if (playerItemsN[Slot5] >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
deleteItem(3706, GetItemSlot(3706), TotPrice2);
addItem(itemID, 1);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1)
> server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
break;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough tokens for this item.”);
}
}

            if (MyShopID == 36) {
                if (playerItemsN[Slot5] >= TotPrice2) {
                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                        deleteItem(3706, GetItemSlot(3706), TotPrice2);
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough tokens for this item.");
                }
	}[/code][code]					if (MyShopID == 27) {
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" Champion

Tokens"+ShopAdd);
}else{
if (MyShopID == 36) {
sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs “+ShopValue+” Champion

Tokens"+ShopAdd);[/code]

Read full topic
